Magic Notes:
Careful Spell: Spend 1 Sorcery Point to protect 3 creature(s) from your spell
Distant Spell: Spend 1 Sorcery Point to dbl spell range or touch at 30'
Divine Magic: Access to Cleric spells
Elemental Adept (Cold): Spells ignore cold resistance, treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Elemental Adept (Fire): Spells ignore fire resistance, treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Empowered Healing: R5' Spend 1 Sorcery Point to reroll self or ally healing dice 1/tn
Empowered Spell: Spend 1 Sorcery Point to re-roll 3 spell damage dice
Eyes Of The Dark: Cast Darkness using spell slot or 2 Sorcery Points
Flexible Casting: Convert Sorcery Points to and from spell slots
Font Of Magic: 20 Sorcery Points/long rest
Heart Of The Storm: R10' 10 HP lightning/thunder damage when casting lightning/thunder spell
Shadow Walk: Bonus action to teleport 120' between dim or dark areas
Sorcerous Restoration: Regain 4 Sorcery Points/short rest
Storm Guide: Stop rain in 20' radius or direct winds in 100' radius for 1 tn
Tempestuous Magic: Fly 10' before or after casting spell level 1+
Umbral Form: Spend 6 Sorcery Points to become shadow (move through objects, resistance to non-force, non-radiant damage) for 1 min
Unearthly Recovery: Regain 42 HP when lower than 42 1/long rest
Wind Soul: R30' Self and 6 others fly 30' for 1 hr 1/long rest

* Ability Boosts: +1 Dexterity
